author: timbeiko
content:
**Ropsten TTD Override**

Note: the Merge TTD for Ropsten is `50000000000000000`. If you are running a node or validator, you will need to perform a TTD override on it. More background, and instructions for doing so are available here: https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/03/ropsten-merge-ttd/
